name: Almond Butter Toast
ingredients: 2 tbsp. almond butter, 1 slice whole-wheat bread

name: Ants on a Log
ingredients: 2 stalks celery, 2 tbsp. peanut butter, 1/4 cup raisins
directions: Spread peanut butter on celery. Put raisins on top.

name: Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup strawberries, 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt, 1 cup almond milk
